Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Health

Items.Title: Oversight - Maternal and Newborn Health in New York City
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Maternal and Newborn Health in New York City

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Health

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene to post on its website in a user-friendly format and disseminate certain information mandated by the Maternity Information Act of 1989 (New York State Public Health Law ยง 2803-j).
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the Dep't of Health and Mental Hygiene to post on its website in a user-friendly format and disseminate certain information mandated by the Maternity Information Act of 1989 (New York State Public Health Law ยง 2803-j).

Items.Title: Oversight - Maternal and Newborn Health in New York City
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Maternal and Newborn Health in New York City

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene to post on its website in a user-friendly format and disseminate certain information mandated by the Maternity Information Act of 1989 (New York State Public Health Law ยง 2803-j).
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the Dep't of Health and Mental Hygiene to post on its website in a user-friendly format and disseminate certain information mandated by the Maternity Information Act of 1989 (New York State Public Health Law ยง 2803-j).

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Mendez, Liu, Dickens, Rivera, Stewart, Arroyo, Vann, McMahon and Public Advocate Betsy Gotbaum
